DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the clinical, genetic and environmental factors associated with the phenotype "severe psychotic symptoms" caused by cocaine.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical and Genetic Factors Associated With Psychotic Symptoms Among Cocaine Abusers
DOC.detailed_description: The second purpose is to include gene x environment interaction and to analyse the factors associated with the presence or the absence of severe psychotic symptoms induced by cocaine.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Adults, cocaine users, who have signed an informed consent Exclusion criteria: Poor venous condition (for blood samples), specially protected people, non French speaking, people who refuse to sign the consent.
